      • insert

        public boolean insert(Car car)
               throws WrongInputException
        The function is inserting the given car into the appropriate slot, checking their type, if any is free. When the car is inserted, the slot is set as OCCUPIED and the structures are set up according to the state. The slots store the time of entering by using LocalDateTime now. The function returns true if a slot of the same type is available
        Parameters:
        car - car entering in the parking
        Returns:
        true if the car is inserted
        Throws:
        WrongInputException - Wrong input exception
        See Also:
        LocalDateTime

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Car car)
               throws WrongDateException,
                      WrongInputException
        The function is removing the given car out of the appropriate slot and bills the customer. When the car is removed, the slot is set as FREE and the structures are set up according to the state. The slots store the time of exiting by using LocalDateTime now. The function returns true if the car is removed correctly.
        Parameters:
        car - a car
        Returns:
        true if the car is removed and the customer is billed
        Throws:
        WrongDateException - Wrong date exception
        WrongInputException - Wrong input exception
        See Also:
        LocalDateTime
